cooldown: {"embed": {"title": "Hey, wait!","url": "", "color": "fail","description": "Please wait before use this command!","footer": {"text": "You can always donate to us to reduce the cooldown!"},"fields": [{"name":"Remain","value": "<command.cooldown>"},{"name": "Command","value": "<command.name>"}]}}
noargs:
{"embed": {"title": "More args!!", "url": "", "color": "fail","description": "Please specify more arguments!
 If you don't know how to use this command, check `!help <command>`."}}
noperm: {"embed": {"title": "No permissions!", "url": "", "color": "fail", "description": "I'm sorry but you don't have permissions to perform this command."}}
nolink: {"embed": {"title": "Not a link!", "url": "", "color": "fail", "description": "Please specify real link! It must starts with `http://` or `https://`."}}
